description: Query a variety of data from Brasil resources seamlessly. Access information on postal codes, area codes, banks, holidays, taxes, and more through a unified interface. Enhance your AI agents and applications with rich and updated data from BrasilAPI effortlessly.

capabilities.name: get_postal_code_v1
capabilities.description: Get a location data given a CEP (postal code).

capabilities.name: get_postal_code_v2
capabilities.description: Version 2 of get a location data given a CEP (postal code).

capabilities.name: get_isbn
capabilities.description: Get information about a book given an ISBN.

capabilities.name: get_cnpj
capabilities.description: Get information about a company given a CNPJ.

capabilities.name: get_all_banks
capabilities.description: Get information of all banks from Brazil.

capabilities.name: get_bank_by_code
